EmailTemplate.description: Send customer a url link to e-NDA form for America accounts
EmailTemplate.name: Contact: e-NDA Americas link with Letterhead
EmailTemplate.subject: u-blox Americas Inc.: Non-Disclosure and Restricted Use Agreement (NDA) with u-blox AG
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please find below the link to the standard mutual NDA with u-blox America, Inc.:
https://www.u-blox.com/en/non-disclosure-agreement-americas?ub_contact__c={!User.Alias}
Under this link, you will be able to fill in a web form and to agree to the terms of the NDA by validly submitting the form.
We thank you and send you our best regards,
u-blox America Inc. 1902 Campus Commons Drive Suite 310 Reston, VA 20191 USA
Phone: +1 703 483 3180 Fax: +1 703 483 3179 Email: info_us@u-blox.com
